Package de.lessvoid.nifty.spi.node

The Nifty Service Provider Interface (SPI) Package for custom NiftyNode implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NiftyControlBuilder
    Created by void on 08.02.16.
    NiftyControlNode
    Interface for all Nifty Controls.
    NiftyControlNodeImpl<T extends NiftyControlNode,B extends NiftyControlBuilder>  
    NiftyLayoutNodeImpl<T extends NiftyNode>
    This interface defines the simple layout node for Nifty.
    NiftyLayoutReceiver<T extends NiftyNode>
    This interface defines a node that is able to receive layout data from outer layout nodes.
    NiftyNode
    The public NiftyNode marker interface.
    NiftyNodeAccessor<T extends NiftyNode>  
    NiftyNodeContentImpl<T extends NiftyNode>
    NiftyNodeCanvasImpl is a renderable NiftyNode.
    NiftyNodeImpl<T extends NiftyNode>
    The NiftyNodeImpl is the base of the NiftyNode implementation hierachy.
    NiftyNodeStateImpl<T extends NiftyNode>
    NiftyNodeStateImpl is a state aware NiftyNode.

Package de.lessvoid.nifty.spi.node Description

The Nifty Service Provider Interface (SPI) Package for custom NiftyNode implementations.
Since:
2.0
